In this section you can display MORE: In this section you can display the product details and contact the owner if this ad is interesting for you...
You can also add it to your favorites MO: You can also add it to your favorites in case you want to receive notifications whenever the product is modified by its owner.
Edit the product details and MORE: In this section you can update the product details (type, picture, name, tags, price and description). In order to change the picture click on the current one to change it.
You cant modify the favorites MORE: It is not possible to modify product status (booked/sold) from this section. For that navigate to product detail or manage it from your section 'My ads'
Create the product details and MORE: In this section you can publish new products in Wallaclone. Give the product a type, name, select some tags, enter a price and description, and then click the save button.
From now on go to publish MORE: From then on, the product will be visible for all the other users, and you can also manage it trough your 'My ads' section
In this section you can manage MORE: In this section you can manage your publications. Booking them, selling them, go to edit or even delete those that do not apply any more. In case you want to add a new product click the button 'add product'
Have a look to all the user MORE: Have a look at all the product published for this user. Those that are of your interes you can add it to your favs, and Wallaclone will notify you all the changes on them...
Here you have all the detail regarding a: Here you have all the detail regarding all the products you sold/bought in Wallaclone...
Here you can follow up all the products: Here you can follow up all the products that you have included in your favorites...
In this section you can manage all the c: In this section you can manage all the conversations you have with other members of Wallaclone...

From this section you can modify your pr: In this section you can modify your name, login email and password in Wallaclone. You can also personalize your user by uploading a profile avatar. That way the rest of the users will be able to identify your ads better.
